name: Rules
text:
§183-2  Rules.  Subject to chapter 91, the department shall adopt, amend, and repeal rules for and concerning the preservation, protection, regulation, extension, and utilization of forest reserves designated by the department.
     All rules shall have the force and effect of law. [L 1903, c 44, pt of §5; am L 1913, c 36, §1; am L 1917, c 232, §1; RL 1925, pt of §586; am L 1927, c 54, pt of §2; RL 1935, pt of §176; RL 1945, pt of §1006; RL 1955, pt of §18-8; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §22; am L 1961, c 132, §1; am L 1965, c 96, §13; HRS §183-2; am L 1981, c 85, §4; am L 1985, c 174, §3]
